title: Know the Commonwealth. No. 2. New Zealand
brief_description: Two islands at the opposite end of the world to Britain are the home of two races - Maori and British. When first discovered, New Zealand was called the land of the Long White Cloud - the first British people arrived in 1830. New Zealanders are very proud of their unity. Also shows the natural hot water springs and various agricultural industries.
